name: Steam Engine
description: A machine that converts steam into mechanical power.

name: Boiler
description: A vessel for generating steam under pressure.

name: Steam Turbine
description: A device that converts steam into rotational motion.

name: Steam Locomotive
description: A train powered by steam. Revolutionizes transportation.

name: Railroad Track
description: A path for trains. Enables rapid land transport.

name: Train Car
description: A vehicle that runs on rails.

name: Steam Ship
description: A ship powered by steam. Independent of wind.

name: Steam Hammer
description: A large hammer powered by steam.

name: Steam Pump
description: A pump powered by steam.

name: Steam Press
description: A machine for pressing materials using steam.

name: Coal Mine
description: A facility for extracting coal from the earth.

name: Mining Equipment
description: Tools and machinery for extracting resources.

name: Blast Furnace
description: A furnace for smelting iron using coal.

name: Steel Mill
description: A facility for producing steel on a large scale.

name: Factory
description: A building for mass production using machines.

name: Assembly Line
description: A method of production where items move through stations.

name: Machine Tool
description: A tool for making other machines.

name: Lathe
description: A machine for shaping materials by rotation.

name: Milling Machine
description: A machine for cutting and shaping materials.

name: Drill Press
description: A machine for drilling precise holes.

name: Power Loom
description: A machine for weaving fabric automatically.

name: Spinning Jenny
description: A machine for spinning multiple threads.

name: Cotton Gin
description: A machine for separating cotton from seeds.

name: Sewing Machine
description: A machine for stitching fabric.

name: Textile Mill
description: A factory for producing textiles.

name: Steam Boiler
description: A device for generating steam.

name: Pressure Gauge
description: A device for measuring pressure.

name: Steam Valve
description: A device for controlling steam flow.

name: Safety Valve
description: A valve that releases pressure automatically.

name: Steam Whistle
description: A device that produces sound using steam.

name: Steam Gauge
description: A device for monitoring steam pressure.

name: Steam Pipe
description: A pipe for transporting steam.

name: Steam Trap
description: A device for removing condensate from steam.

name: Steam Jacket
description: A heated enclosure for maintaining temperature.

name: Industrial Chimney
description: A tall structure for venting smoke.

name: Smokestack
description: A pipe for venting exhaust gases.

name: Industrial Complex
description: A large area with multiple factories.

name: Workers' Housing
description: Housing built for factory workers.

name: Canals
description: Artificial waterways for transportation.

name: Locks
description: A device for raising and lowering boats in canals.

name: Steam Crane
description: A crane powered by steam.

name: Steam Excavator
description: A machine for digging powered by steam.

name: Steam Roller
description: A machine for compacting roads.

name: Asphalt
description: A material for paving roads.

name: Concrete
description: A building material made from cement and aggregates.

name: Cement
description: A binding material used in concrete.

name: Steel Beam
description: A structural element made from steel.

name: Steel Frame
description: A framework made from steel beams.

name: Skyscraper
description: A very tall building made possible by steel frames.

name: Industrial Revolution
description: The transformation to machine-based manufacturing.
